sentences.en: an actor famous for his rugged good looks
sentences.cn: 以其粗犷美而出名的男演员

sentences.en: At twenty - five he won a three - mile steeple - chase against the most rugged competitor.
sentences.cn: 在 二十五 岁的时候,他在三哩 越野 比赛中战胜了最强壮的竞争对手.

sentences.en: Cold cathode sensing tubes are more rugged than the glass, hot - filament tubes.
sentences.cn: 冷阴极传感管比玻璃热丝管坚实.

sentences.en: Here another rugged castle crowns the cliffs and crags.
sentences.cn: 这里又有一座高低不平的城堡建在悬崖绝壁之上。

sentences.en: McDermott gave a cheerful grin which contorted his rugged, almost ugly features.
sentences.cn: 麦克德莫特愉快地咧嘴一笑,顿时使他那粗犷的, 近乎丑陋的容貌变了样.

sentences.en: Planes parachuted food, clothing, blankets, medicine and water into the rugged mountainous border region.
sentences.cn: 飞机将食品、衣物、毯子、药品和水空投到崎岖多山的边界地区。
橄榄球运动员必须健壮.

sentences.en: She was now a thin , though rugged, woman of twenty - seven .
sentences.cn: 她现在 二十七 岁, 虽然硬健,但形容消瘦.

sentences.en: The camera combines rugged reliability with unequalled optical performance and speed.
sentences.cn: 这款相机既坚固耐用，又有超凡的光学性能和快门速度。

sentences.en: The enemy would always have the advantage of familiarity with the rugged terrain.
sentences.cn: 敌人一直都占有熟悉丘陵地形的优势。

sentences.en: The Rocky Mountains have rugged mountains and roads.
sentences.cn: 落基山脉有崇山峻岭和崎岖不平的道路.

sentences.en: the rugged beauty of the Highlands
sentences.cn: 苏格兰高地崎岖起伏的美景

sentences.en: The rugged relics of the Roman past lay scattered about her.
sentences.cn: 古罗马这些粗犷质朴的古迹散布在她的周围.

sentences.en: They admired the rugged beauty of the coastline.
sentences.cn: 他们对海岸线上岩石密布的美景赞叹不已。

sentences.en: They sailed along the rugged coastline.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着多岩石的海岸线航行.

words.tran_cn: 强度，坚固性；险峻，崎岖；粗野

trans.tran_cn: 崎岖的，凹凸不平的，结实的，崴
trans.tran_en: land that is rugged is rough and uneven
